From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Unitron/Serpentor/Minion/Chaos/Demon Wulf/Dark 
Claw/Flesh Ripper:




Dark One barrell rolled, dodging a most of the lasers, a few hitting his 
wing, almost losing control of his current mode, but with extreme skill, Dark 
One was flying almost as good as before.

Getting a target lock, he launched two missiles at the Mafia base.

---

"Of course not!" Breakdown retorted, firing a blast of pure laser from his 
cannon, heading at Belnder's disk.

---

(Pyro is currently a tank Code, you can't see his face)

Pyro simply laughed as Stronghold punched at him, driving forward at full 
speed, trying to ram him down.  At the same time, he fired two fire balls 
forward at the Mafia base.

---

Hiss ducked under the missile, the explosion almost toppling him over.  He 
returned fire with three fusion blasts at Stronghold.  "WHY WON'T YOU DIE?!"

---

Scavenger fired off 25 explosive rounds at Rizopas.

---

Demon Wulf took a few steps back, sidestepping, a dent in his abdomen armor 
from the big autoguns.  "These fools anger me." he said quitely, firing off 
another blade missile from his sword at the Mafia base.

---

"I agree brother.  They do not know when to surrender or when to DIE." Flesh 
Ripper yelled out, firing three blasts from his rifle at Blender.

---

Dark Claw formed two orbs, both blew, both the size of two of his fists, and 
one in each hand.  He threw both orbs, with the effects of grenades, at the 
Mafia Base.

---

Serpentor cursed.  "Yeah, that's right, why don't we just attack the base, 
and IGNORE ALL THE SLAGGING ENEMIES SHOOTING AT US!" he screamed, firing off 
three bolts from his plasma rifle at Sharpedge, 15 rapid optic blasts at 
Jetstorm.

---

Sixshot, in a strafing run, fired two missiles at the Mafia base.  "The 
shields are back up," he commented to himself as he gained altitude, "great."

---

Unitron spun in the air, avoiding minimal autogun fire.  Loading his missile 
launchers, he pulled up, then dived straight down at the Mafia base.  He 
fired two missiles down, and then pulled up.

---

Minion slammed to the ground from autogun fire.

---

Chaos cursed.  "One cycle.  Excellent." he fired off 25 rapid optic blasts at 
Sharpedge.
